(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Ergonomic Benefits

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you’re at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

HUANUO Foot Rest

Enjoy the feeling of relaxation at any time.

HUANUO Hot New Releases

HUANUO Office Chair&Organizer

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.4 x 13.27 x 4.41 inches; 4.63 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ HNFR3
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 24, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ HUANUO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07L3RVF7C
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Adjustable Height – Height is manually adjustable to 3 different positions: 4.3″ , 5.5 “, 6.7” (11cm/14 cm/17cm). Super easy for you to find the perfect position to suit your needs
Easy Angle Adjustment – Tilts -30°- +30°to support your legs at your preferred angle. The Angle can’t be fixed, it rocks back and forth which encourages leg movement
Massage Textured Surface – Comes with a large non-skid surface (18″ X 13″), free-floating platform texture made up of geometric circular bumps for enhanced stress reduction during the work day. Perfect for office and home use
Pre-Assembled For Use- This adjustable foot rest is pre-assembled for immediate use. Non slip feet enhances overall stability. Sturdy construction offer you comfortable experience while you’re working or studying

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you're at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

Ergonomic Benefits

Great foot rest for working at a computer. Comes with the adjustability for your desired height. Features a free-floating platform that tilts back and forth which encourages full leg stretches and lower-leg movement, and helps minimize fatigue and increase circulation, which is important when sitting for long periods of time.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Multi-Position Design

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. It supports better posture and reduces physical stress. Being completely adjustable to multiple tilt angles and height settings. It allows you to find what is just right for you to relax comfortably.

Multi-Position Design

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. Choose the proper height for you to to relax comfortably.

Adjustable Heights

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. Choose the proper height for you to to relax comfortably.

Textured Surface

This foot rest comes with a textured surface made up of geometric circular bumps for enhanced stress reduction during the work day. When barefoot or wearing socks, the uneven surface creates a massaging effect on the soles of feet. Simply move your feet in any direction over the bumpy surface.

Read more

Fully Assembled

Flat design for easy storage. Comes fully assembled which makes it ready for immediate use out of box. Non slip feet enhance stress reduction and overall stability.

Read more
